price: tí ó ń rìn (lórí omi) lójú Wa. (Ó jẹ́) ẹ̀san nítorí ẹni tí wọ́n ṣàì gbàgbọ́ nínú rẹ̀.
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
